subject_source: Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
comment: Could map to UBERON:0002998 (inferior frontal gyrus) as the VLPFC is located on it. Chose broad map to PFC to maintain consistency as a lexical mapping. Reccomendation to UBERON to parse PFC directionally

subject_source: Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
comment: Reccomendation to UBERON to parse PFC directionally

comment: There is no region encompassing both the motor and premotor cortices. Could have mapped more generally to UBERON_0000956 (cerebral cortex) but specificity would have been lost. Chose to do two separate mappings for this joint region

subject_label: Insula and others in lateral sulcus
subject_source: Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
comment: There is no region encompassing both the insula and the lateral sulcus (and its parts). Could have mapped more generally to UBERON:0000956 (cerebral cortex) but specificity would have been lost. Chose to do two separate mappings for this joint region.

subject_label: Insula and others in lateral sulcus
subject_source: Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
comment: This is the second of the two mappings chosen to be done for this joint region. "Others in the lateral sulcus" is not a clear entity, so I chose to map generally to the lateral sulcus to capture the structures that make it up

subject_label: Lateral and inferior temporal cortical region
subject_source: Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
comment: The temporal cortex is not broken down regionally, so mapped this generally. Included a second narrow match to the lateral part of the temporal cortex but could not do the same for the inferior part. Reccomendation to UBERON is to include these specific regions

subject_label: Lateral and inferior temporal cortical region
subject_source: Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
comment: The region encompasses most of the lateral temporal cortex. Reccommendation to UBERON is to have distinct directional parcellations of the temporal cortex so as not to rely on Broadmann areas

subject_label: Ventral areas of the temporal lobe
subject_source: Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
comment: This region encompasses most of the ventral temporal cortex. Reccommendation to UBERON is to have distinct directional parcellations of the temporal cortex so as not to rely on Broadmann areas

subject_source: Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
Liu C, et al. Marmoset Brain Mapping V3: Population multi-modal standard volumetric and surface-based templates. Neuroimage (2021) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117620.
comment: There is no region encompassing only the posterior cingulate and retrospinal regions. Chose to map narrowly to both UBERON:0022353 (posterior cingulate cortex) and UBERON:0013531 (retrosplenial region), as well as  broadly to UBERON:0003027 (cingulate cortex)
